thread.title: ezPaycheck 2015 Payroll Software Enhanced with New PTO Feature
thread.title_full: ezPaycheck 2015 Payroll Software Enhanced with New PTO Feature

author: PRWEB
title: ezPaycheck 2015 Payroll Software Enhanced with New PTO Feature
text:
ezPaycheck 2015 payroll software has just been updated to include many time off features for the accommodation of both employers and team members. Los Angeles, CA
Developerâ€™s for ezPaycheck payroll software are proud to announce the release of the latest version of this application to include paid time off (PTO), sick time, leave time, and vacation time off tracking feature. Both employers and team members are accommodated by this feature from Halfpricesoft.com at no additional cost to current 2015 ezPaycheck customers.
"ezPaycheck 2015 payroll software has just been updated to include a variety of time off features for the accommodation of both employers and team members," explains Dr. Ge, President and Founder of Halfpricesoft.com
This feature is released at no cost to current customers of ezPaycheck 2015 payroll software. Test drive it at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp .
Unique features for ezPaycheck payroll software include but are not limited to:
New tax preparer line for CPA use New PTO, vacation, sick, and leave feature added. Easy-to-follow quick start guides Tax tables and calculations for all 50 states and D.C Flexibility for adding local tax rates Capacity for unlimited deductions, including pre-tax deductions Payroll check printing on blank computer checks or preprinted checks Printing options for MICR bank routing numbers, account numbers, check numbers and bank information on blank check stock Image signature printing on checks W2 and W3 forms calculating and printing Automatic calculation of Federal Withholding Tax, Social Security, Medicare Tax and Employer Unemployment Taxes Support for daily, weekly, biweekly, semimonthly and monthly payroll periods Support for tips and commissions Form 940 and 941 printing for federal tax return Support for multiple check formats: check-in-middle, check-on-top, and check-at-bottom Many easy-to-use reports Unlimited technical support Capability for handling payroll for multiple companies
To start the 30-day test drive, visit the site at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp .
About Halfpricesoft.com
Halfpricesoft.com is a leading provider of small business software, including payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, accounting software, check printing software, W2, software, 1099 software, and ezACH direct deposit software. Software from Halfpricesoft.com is trusted by thousands of customers and will assist small business owners in simplifying payroll processing and business management. Visit http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp for details and download.
